content: cute mini christmas jumper ornament to decorate your home this festive season you can make a few in different colours and hang them onto your tree or string them together into a bunting the finished ornament is around 7 cm tall you can use any scrap yarn for these which makes them a great stash buster pattern i used leftover swish worsted yarn from knitpicks in white and serrano it is a great beginner friendly pattern that uses single_crochet chain and slip_stitch it is worked top down with a round yoke so it does not require any sewing at all
